Module com.example.froggeroop
Package com.example.froggeroop.util

Class Timer

java.lang.Object
com.example.froggeroop.util.Observable
com.example.froggeroop.util.Timer
public class Timer extends Observable
Timer is an Observable type object which sends signals at some frequency.
